summary: The diff shows modifications to frontend components integrating image references, but no evidence of actual image file generation. REQ-1 (image generation and placement in frontend/public/assets/generated) appears unimplemented, while REQ-2 (integration into components) is partially implemented with image references.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add new images to the application - images must be generated and placed in frontend/public/assets/generated directory
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added files in frontend/public/assets/generated. Only code references to image paths are present, but the actual image files (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png, organic-section.dim_800x500.png, promo-basket.dim_600x600.png, farm-to-table.dim_400x400.png) are not shown as created.
Header.tsx references /assets/generated/shop-logo.dim_200x200.png which was not specified in the BuildRequest image requirements and is not shown as generated.

hallucinated_features.description: Added shop-logo.dim_200x200.png image reference in Header component
hallucinated_features.reason: This image was not requested in the BuildRequest image requirements. Only hero-banner, organic-section, promo-basket, and farm-to-table images were specified.

hallucinated_features.description: Added organic farm-to-table section with landscape image and description
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest specified non-goals include 'Changing the backend data structure; Modifying the existing product catalog functionality' but makes no mention of adding new content sections. This appears to be new content beyond image integration.
BuildRequest contains no requirement to update project state tracking or architectural notes. This file modification was not requested.
